entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 08:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
